author: cms-sw
body:
Apparently now there's no auto-fwd-port from MAOD to AN sub-branches, so as a workaround I'm doing it by hand as a PR.

`CMSSW_9_4_MAOD_X` is identical to `CMSSW_9_4_5_cand1` except for the fwd-port of #22671 (that should be also in `CMSSW_9_4_AN_X`), according to the diffs https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_9_4_5_cand1...CMSSW_9_4_MAOD_X

This merge is needed since upcoming analysis updates will be based on the code for the miniAOD v2 that is in the MAOD branch, and putting everything in a single PR would make the diff unreadable.
title: Merge 9_4_MAOD_X into 9_4_AN_X
